name: Next.js Middleware GeoIP リダイレクト (概念)
description: 国コードでのルーティング概念

files.template:
import { NextResponse } from 'next/server';
export function middleware(req: Request){ const url = new URL(req.url); const country = (req as any).geo?.country; if(country==='JP' && url.pathname.startsWith('/en')) return NextResponse.redirect(new URL('/ja', url)); return NextResponse.next(); }
